relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Scarlet Red Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bold scarlet red roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Scarlett Red
relproducts.description: Stirloscarlett red plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

relproducts.title: Infusion Asc Raspberry Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Infusion asc raspberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

relproducts.title: Meadow Flower Asc Redcurrant Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Part of their meadow flower range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

relproducts.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Meadow Flower Asc Redcurrent
relproducts.description: Meadow flower asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. relproducts.title: Hive Blackout Berry Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Hive blackoutberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
